response.overview: Rebecca fainted in the church just before she could say “I DO” and was rushed to the hospital. Greg mysteriously found her in the middle of the street when he nearly ran over her. He took her home when she asked him to help her. Though he knew little about her, he fell in love with her months after staying with him. On their way to the church to be married it happened again. Find out the mystery behind her ways.
response.tagline: The spirit world is a complicated atmosphere.
response.title: Tears in My Eyes
